## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATOPT6, OPT6</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA OLIGOPEPTIDE TRANSPORTER 6, oligopeptide transporter 1
- **Description:**   oligopeptide transporter 1;(source:Araport11)
